## simple-ipam init

Initialize an empty IPAM file

```
simple-ipam init [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -d, --description string   Root IPAM file description
  -f, --file string          Root IPAM file to create (default "ipam")
  -h, --help                 help for init
```
